I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (m : Map bool), reconnaissance (non_coacc_kill p m) a t -> ensemble_base state p m -> reconnaissance p a t

ensemble_base : forall A : Set, Map A -> Map bool -> Prop
Inductive term : Set := app : ad -> term_list -> term with term_list : Set := tnil : term_list | tcons : term -> term_list -> term_list
ad = N : Set
preDTA = Map state : Set
Inductive reconnaissance : preDTA -> ad -> term -> Prop := rec_dta : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (ladj : state), MapGet state d a = Some ladj -> state_reconnait d ladj t -> reconnaissance d a t with state_reconnait : preDTA -> state -> term -> Prop := rec_st : forall (d : preDTA) (s : state) (c : ad) (tl : term_list) (l : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s c = Some l -> liste_reconnait d l tl -> state_reconnait d s (app c tl) with liste_reconnait : preDTA -> prec_list -> term_list -> Prop := rec_empty : forall d : preDTA, liste_reconnait d prec_empty tnil | rec_consi : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (la ls :
Inductive Map (A : Type) : Type := M0 : Map A | M1 : ad -> A -> Map A | M2 : Map A -> Map A -> Map A For Map: Argument scope is [type_scope] For M0: Argument scope is [type_scope] For M1: Argument scopes are [type_scope _ _] For M2: Argument scopes are [type_scope _ _]

state = Map prec_list : Set

predta_coacc_contain_coacc_ads_0 : forall (d : preDTA) (a0 a : ad) (s : state) (c : ad) (p : prec_list) (b : ad) (m : Map bool), preDTA_ref_ok d -> MapGet state d a = Some s -> MapGet prec_list s c = Some p -> prec_occur p b -> ensemble_base state d m -> MapGet bool m a = Some true -> MapGet bool (predta_coacc d a0 m) b = Some true

mstrec_ind : forall (P : forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance p a t -> Prop) (P0 : forall (p : preDTA) (s : state) (t : term), state_reconnait p s t -> Prop) (P1 : forall (p : preDTA) (p0 : prec_list) (t : term_list), liste_reconnait p p0 t -> Prop), (forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (ladj : state) (e : MapGet state d a = Some ladj) (s : state_reconnait d ladj t), P0 d ladj t s -> P d a t (rec_dta d a t ladj e s)) ->...-> forall (p : preDTA) (s : state) (t : term) (s0 : state_reconnait p s t), P0 p s t s0

semantic_equiv_1 : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance d a t -> rec_term d a t (essence t d) = true
dta_reconnait : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance d a t -> Prop

lattice_bounded_10 : forall (A : Set) (m : Map A) (p : prechain bool), sas_chain bool (ensemble_base A m) lem p -> chain_length bool p <= S (MapCard A m)
predta_coacc_rev : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (m : Map bool) (b : ad), MapGet bool (predta_coacc d a m) b = Some true -> ensemble_base state d m -> (exists (a0 : ad) (s : state) (c : ad) (p : prec_list), MapGet state d a0 = Some s /\ MapGet prec_list s c = Some p /\ prec_occur p b /\ MapGet bool m a0 = Some true) \/ a = b
map_replace_def_ok_d : forall (d : preDTA) (m : Map bool) (a : ad) (x : bool), ensemble_base state d m -> ensemble_base state d (map_replace bool m a x)
pre_reconnait : forall (d : preDTA) (p : prec_list) (t : term_list), liste_reconnait d p t -> Prop
predta_kill_non_coacc_rec_def_1 : forall (p : preDTA) (s : state) (t : term), state_reconnait p s t -> Prop
state_reconnait_ind : forall P : preDTA -> state -> term -> Prop, (forall (d : preDTA) (s : state) (c : ad) (tl : term_list) (l : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s c = Some l -> liste_reconnait d l tl -> P d s (app c tl)) -> forall (p : preDTA) (s : state) (t : term), state_reconnait p s t -> P p s t
invar_1_0 : forall (d : preDTA) (a c : ad) (t : term_list) (n : nat) (s : state) (p : prec_list), MapGet state d a = Some s -> MapGet prec_list s c = Some p -> rec_list_terms d p t n = true -> rec_term d a (app c t) (S n) = true
sem_equiv_prop_t = fun t : term => forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (n : nat), rec_term d a t n = true -> reconnaissance d a t : term -> Prop
map_or_inc_ld : forall (d : preDTA) (m m0 m1 : Map bool), ensemble_base state d m -> lemd d m0 m1 -> lemd d (map_or m0 m) (map_or m1 m)
Inductive reconnaissance : preDTA -> ad -> term -> Prop := rec_dta : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (ladj : state), MapGet state d a = Some ladj -> state_reconnait d ladj t -> reconnaissance d a t with state_reconnait : preDTA -> state -> term -> Prop := rec_st : forall (d : preDTA) (s : state) (c : ad) (tl : term_list) (l : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s c = Some l -> liste_reconnait d l tl -> state_reconnait d s (app c tl) with liste_reconnait : preDTA -> prec_list -> term_list ->...-> liste_reconnait d (prec_cons a la ls) (tcons hd tl)

predta_kill_non_coacc_rec_0 : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (ladj : state) (e : MapGet state d a = Some ladj) (s : state_reconnait d ladj t), predta_kill_non_coacc_rec_def_1 d ladj t s -> predta_kill_non_coacc_rec_def_0 d a t (rec_dta d a t ladj e s)

lattice_lemd_bounded_1_def = fun p : prechain bool => lattice_lemd_bounded_0_def p -> forall m : Map bool, lattice_lemd_bounded_0_def (concat bool p m) : prechain bool -> Prop
term_term_list_ind : forall (P : term -> Prop) (P0 : term_list -> Prop), (forall (a : ad) (t : term_list), P0 t -> P (app a t)) -> P0 tnil -> (forall t : term, P t -> forall t0 : term_list, P0 t0 -> P0 (tcons t t0)) -> forall t : term, P t

intros p a t m H1 H2.
apply reconnaissance_ind with (d := non_coacc_kill p m).
- intros d a0 t ladj H3 H4.

  + apply H3.
  + apply H4.
- assumption.
Qed.
